Activity: Arrive at the office, prepare a cup of coffee, and check emails for urgent requests or updates from the team. Briefly review the week's goals: investor relations strategy, presentation materials, marketing coordination, and initial outreach.
Review previous meeting notes and action items related to UHNWI targeting. Identify any outstanding questions or tasks.
Schedule a meeting with @coo-1 and @cio-1 to discuss the overall investor relations strategy for targeting UHNWIs. Email: [To: @coo-1, @cio-1 Subject: UHNWI Investor Relations Strategy Discussion]
Research successful investor relations strategies employed by similar quantitative hedge funds targeting UHNWIs. Focus on messaging, channels, and relationship-building tactics.
Attend the meeting with @coo-1 and @cio-1 to brainstorm and finalize the investor relations strategy. Take detailed notes and assign responsibilities.

Begin drafting the investor relations strategy document, incorporating feedback from the meeting with @coo-1 and @cio-1. Outline key objectives, target audience profile, communication channels, and success metrics.
Review the draft strategy with @legal-1 to ensure compliance with SEC regulations and relevant legal considerations. Email: [To: @legal-1 Subject: Review of Investor Relations Strategy Draft]
Start outlining the presentation materials for potential investors. Define the key message points, and identify relevant data and visuals to support the fund's strategy, risk profile, and team.
Send a summary of the investor relation strategy to @coo-1 and @cio-1 for final comments. Prepare the to-do list for tomorrow
